target_markets.market_description: Couples planning intimate weddings with less than 50 guests
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Especially big in New York, LA, Miami where cost per wedding guest exceeds $1,000

problems_validated.problem: Traditional weddings are becoming unaffordably expensive
problems_validated.severity: High - costs have gotten 'out of control' due to inflation
problems_validated.current_solutions: Traditional large wedding venues and planners
problems_validated.market_gap: Small venues lack visibility and marketing budgets, couples unaware of micro wedding options

business_strategies.implementation: Form partnership agreements with venues for 5-20% commission on bookings

business_strategies.implementation: Start with humans, transition to AI-assisted work, then to full AI agents
business_strategies.expected_results: Margins increase from 20% to 60-80% when paying tokens instead of humans
business_strategies.case_study: Design agencies and SEO shops as examples

business_strategies.implementation: Spend $2 per click to generate $3 in value
business_strategies.expected_results: Create vending machine effect where you put $2 in and $3 comes out

problems_solutions.problem: Small wedding venues lack visibility and marketing reach
problems_solutions.solution: Create lead generation platform bridging venues and couples
steps: Specialize and promote as micro wedding expert

startup_ideas.target_market: Couples wanting intimate weddings under 50 people

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not educating the market about new concepts
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: People don't understand why micro weddings are better or how they save money
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Position yourself as the micro wedding expert and educate people on benefits
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Everyone knows they need a wedding when engaged, but don't know about micro wedding concept

growth_tactics.results_expected: Traffic increases as people become aware of micro wedding trend
